content: although this pattern looks complex - it s not this mobius is probably one of the simplest crochet shawls you will ever make it is worked in one piece starting at the chain in the round along both sides in the video i also show you a neat trick to keeping your chain from twisting when you connect to form a large ring how ironic that i show you how not to twist a chain in a video about a shawl with a twist in it
